sw_version.title: Version of CRDS file selection software used
sw_version.description: Identifies the version of the CRDS client software that was used to select calibration reference files during calibration processing.

context_used.title: CRDS context (.pmap) used to select ref files
context_used.description: Identifies the version of the CRDS context (PMAP file) that was used to control the logic involved in selecting certain versions or instances of calibration reference files.

name.title: Pixel area reference file name
name.description: The name of the pixel area map reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: NIRSpec bar shadow reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec bar shadow reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec Camera reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec camera transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec Collimator reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec collimator transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: IFU cube parameters reference file name
name.description: The name of the IFU cube parameters reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Dark reference file name
name.description: The name of the dark current reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Detector Flat reference file name
name.description: Records the name of the NIRSpec detector flat-field (DFLAT) reference file used during level-2b calibration processing.

name.title: Disperser reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec disperser transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Distortion reference file name
name.description: The name of the distortion transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Drizzle parameters reference file name
name.description: The name of the drizzle parameters reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: 1-D extraction parameters reference file name
name.description: The name of the 1-D spectral extraction parameters reference file used during calibration processing.

name.title: Fore-optics Flat reference file name
name.description: Records the name of the NIRSpec fore-optics flat-field (FFLAT) reference file used during level-2b calibration processing.

name.title: Filter Offset reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI filter offset transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Flat reference file name
name.description: The name of the flat-field reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec FORE Model reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec fore-optics transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec FPA Model reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec FPA transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Fringe reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS fringe correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Gain reference file name
name.description: The name of the detector gain (electrons/ADU) reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: ifufore reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec IFU fore transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: ifupost reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec IFU post transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: ifuslicer reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec IFU slicer transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: IPC reference file name
name.description: The name of the Inter-Pixel Capacitance (IPC) correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Last Frame reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI last frame correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Linearity reference file name
name.description: The name of the linearity correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Mask reference file name
name.description: The name of the static bad pixel mask reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec MSA Model reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec Micro-Shutter Array (MSA) transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: MSA operability reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec Micro-Shutter Array (MSA) operability reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Nirspec OTE Model reference file name
name.description: The name of the NIRSpec Optical Telescope Element (OTE) transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Persistence saturation reference file name
name.description: The name of the persistence saturation threshold reference file used during calibration processing.

name.title: Photometric reference file name
name.description: The name of the photometric calibration reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: PSF mask reference file name
name.description: The name of the PSF mask reference file that was used in the level-3 coronagraphic processing step align_refs.

name.title: Pathloss reference file name
name.description: The name of the path loss correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Read noise reference file name
name.description: The name of the detector read noise reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Reference pixels reference file name
name.description: The name of the reference pixel parameters reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Regions reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS regions definition reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Resample parameters reference file name
name.description: The name of the resampling parameters reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Reset reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI reset correction reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: MRS resolution reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS spectral resolution reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: RSCD reference file name
name.description: Records the name of the MIRI Reset Switch Charge Decay (RSCD) reference file that was used.

name.title: Saturation reference file name
name.description: The name of the saturation threshold reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Spectrograph Flat reference file name
name.description: Records the name of the NIRSpec spectrograph flat-field (SFLAT) reference file used during level-2b calibration processing.

name.title: Spectral distortion reference file name
name.description: The name of the reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Straylight reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS spectral distortions reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Superbias reference file name
name.description: The name of the superbias reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Filter throughput reference file name
name.description: The name of the filter throughput reference file used during calibration processing.

name.title: Trap density reference file name
name.description: The name of the persistence trap density reference file used during calibration processing.

name.title: Trap parameters reference file name
name.description: The name of the persistence trap parameters reference file used during calibration processing.

name.title: TSO imaging photometry reference file name
name.description: The name of the TSO photometry reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: V2_V3 Model reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS V2/V3 transform reference file that was used during calibration processing.

name.title: Wavelength Range reference file name
name.description: The name of the MIRI MRS or NIRSpec wavelength range definitions reference file that was used during calibration processing.
